title: Ukraine leader says he hopes 'fragile truce' will hold
text:
Published By: Reuters - World news - Today 
ASTANA (Reuters) - Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko struck a conciliatory tone on Friday in his comments on Russia and Moscow-backed reb...
